name: Family
description: Join the server!

description: Write your first message in the server

name: I'm liking this server
description: Write 100 messages in the server

name: I could write a novel
description: Write 1,000 messages in the server

name: I wrote a novel
description: Write 10,000 messages in the server

name: Child
description: Be in the server for 1 month (30 days)

name: Adult
description: Be in the server for 6 months (180 days)

name: Senior
description: Be in the server for 1 year (365 days)

name: Innovator
description: Come up with a feature that gets implemented

name: Role Chamber
description: Come up with a new role that gets implemented

name: White Hat
description: Solve a bug with the program

name: Beta Tester
description: Helped develop this bot.

name: Teen
description: Be in the server for 3 months (90 days)

name: Midlife crisis
description: Be in the server for 9 months (270 days)

name: Reactor
description: Add a reaction to at least 25 messages

name: Reactionary
description: Add a reaction to at least 50 messages

name: Major reaction
description: Add a reaction to at least 100 messages

name: Overreaction

name: Frequent flyer
description: Chat at least once a day for 15 days

name: Superchatter
description: Chat at least once a day for 30 days
